resources.string: You can close this app now, it will run in the background as shown in the top left corner, it will only prompt you when your neck bends too much.
Raise the phone higher, relax your neck.
Raise the phone Higher! Higher! Higher! Yeah!

The app checks the tilting degree every 1 minute 

When it is below 40, it will raise an alert.

In future, releases, we will let user set the frequency and degree

Battery usage is minimum, does not even show in the usage listing.

Try different degrees and feel your neck movement.
